member_organisations:
Chatham House has Individual Members (natural persons) and approx. 392 Corporate Members: https://www.chathamhouse.org/become-member/corporate-membership/corporate-list 
 
The European Commission Representation Office in London is a corporate member of Chatham House.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Climate Action, Banking and financial services, Migration and asylum

section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication:
EU-supported activities which Chatham House has involvement in:  
 
-Pan African Network for Rapid Research Response, Relief and Preparedness for Infectious Diseases Epidemics 
- EU - India think tank twinning initiative 
- APRAN Asia Pacific Research and Advice Network (research and publications)  
- EU Policy & Outreach Partnership - USA (project involving events, research and publications) 
- Participant in European Parliament Lot 5 defence and security expertise
